name: Zoner Callisto Metafile
summary: A ZMF file is a vector image created by Zoner Callisto, a Czech vector graphics editor. It contains image data in the proprietary Zoner Callisto Metafile (ZMF) format, which includes image layers, lines, shapes, colors, text, and other Callisto elements. Zoner Callisto users often save technical illustrations, business graphics, and other detailed artwork as ZMF files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
